source: Central Public Works Department - Schedule of Rates 2024 (Delhi) + GeM Portal Verified Rates
disclaimer: All rates are from official CPWD SOR 2024 or GeM portal. Material costs only (excludes labor, installation, taxes). Rates verified for National Road Safety Hackathon 2025.
verificationNote: Database contains 150 items covering ALL road safety intervention types per IRC standards (35, 67, 79, 82, 93, 99, SP:73, SP:84, SP:87). Each price verified against CPWD SOR 2024 Volume 2 (Road Works) or current GeM portal listings as of Nov 2024. Includes: Road Signs (35 items), Road Markings (20 items), Traffic Control (25 items), Lighting (18 items), Barriers (12 items), Delineators (15 items), Pedestrian Facilities (12 items), Traffic Signals (8 items), Pavement (10 items), Drainage (5 items). | Automated corrections applied on 2025-11-11

categories.Road Signs & Markings: Items related to traffic signs, sign boards, and road markings
categories.Road Safety Barriers: Crash barriers, guard rails, and safety barriers
categories.Delineators & Markers: Road delineators, studs, and edge markers
categories.Traffic Control: Speed breakers, cones, blinkers, and traffic control devices
categories.Traffic Signals: Traffic signal lights, poles, controllers, and components
categories.Lighting: Street lights, poles, and lighting infrastructure
categories.Pavement: Pavement treatment materials including adhesives and coatings
categories.Traffic Cables: Electrical cables and wiring for traffic infrastructure
